segments.text: Hello Martin . Have you been to any events yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I have . I went to the table tennis yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . It was great . I love Ma Lin . He ’ s my favourite table tennis player . Have you seen anything yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh I still haven ’ t managed to get any tickets . I ’ d love to see something though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let ’ s go to the marathon tomorrow then ! We can just stand by the side of the road .
segments.speaker: S2
